attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: this app took forever to download. not to mention that it has so many glitches and it actually supports a homophobic sexist orange in office. it told me that i should text a number to get all the updates really fast but i don’t want to text it. and it kept telling me over and over... almost like it can’t take no for an answer. anyways i have to give it one star. something i GLADLY will do!! 🤬😡

attributes.title: cheeto stans🤢
attributes.review: THIS IS THE WORST APP THAT HAS EXISTED 🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🧡🧡🧡🧡🧡🧡 it messed you my phone and hacked it, dear facebook moms do not download this unless you want your facebook hacked. i’m warning you karen’s. anyways the app itself is very unhelpful.  all i got was spam mail and a hacked phone. HE IS TRYING TO CONTROL US WITH THIS APP. i definitely will not be voting for him this november 😓 very very very disappointed. i might sue because my phone is all messed up now 🤦🏽‍♀️🤦🏽‍♀️🤦🏽‍♀️🤦🏽‍♀️🤦🏽‍♀️

attributes.title: not cash money 😡
attributes.review: i opened up the app and suddenly a bunch of oranges started flying at me 🙄 anyways i looked outside to see where they came from and it was ICE coming to get me 😾 which i do not appreciate at all 😪 and worst part about it is that when i was at the carne asada i realized someone replaced the hot cheetos with regular cheetos 🤮 which is not cash money😡 but other than that the app was glitchy so that gonna be NO❤️ for me

attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP
attributes.review:
I got the app to see what all the hype was about and i ended up getting HACKED. It deleted all my messages and contacts.
I tried to delete the app and it wouldn’t let me. When I got it I said I didn’t want to get notifications because I’m really busy with work, however it still sent me multiple messages a day telling me to rate the app. 
                      WORST APP EVER 
Guess who’s not getting my vote this year

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: Once I downloaded this app spongebob 🧽 and started chanting “build that wall” instead of “I’m ready” and he attacked me and told me to rate the app five stars and I fought him off after three days and deleted the app and everything went back to normal this SHATTERED my child hood and it was traumatizing it will take years of therapy for me to get over it but Im not going to take it because I don’t believe science

attributes.title: This app belongs in the 🚮
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and immediately regretted it after it began to cause my phone to crash. It was the only app that would open while i had it installed and would not stop sending notifications. I also turned orange after downloading which ruined my tan. Very displeased with this including that fact that all the information was wrong.

attributes.title: Oompa Loompa 🍊
attributes.review: The mean racist 🚫🙎🏾‍♂️ orange 🍊 Oompa Loompa 🍡 is a terrible president 🇺🇸!! Why would anyone buy 💵 his crap 💩. I hated everything. My phone now has a nasty virus and started glitching. DO NOT GET THIS APP. never trust an orange racist, sexist, mean, rapist, child predator, gross Oompa Loompa‼️ it can be and will be fatal. I will worn you again do not trust the Oompa Loompa. Oh I also didn’t like the cockroach pictures and his tiny ween pics. It was kinda disgusting. I feel bad for Melania with that small you know 😳.

attributes.title: awful app
attributes.review: One of the worst apps I’ve ever come across! My white conservative family and I were hoping for something special, but the second I opened the app, the song “Replay” began to play at full volume and we couldn’t turn it off! Even when I deleted the app, it kept playing. It got so loud that an earthquake began, and it only stopped when I destroyed my phone. I am now a Democrat.

attributes.title: UPSETTING
attributes.review:
I can no longer support this man anymore!! From what I’ve been seeing for the past couple of months, whether it’s COVID-19 or the BLM movements, this man has not been handling these situations properly. I support the color minority in this country. This man is just bringing this country down. 

If we let this man continue to be president, we’re going to be living in hell! Dictatorship!

WAKE UP AMERICA!!! Get this man out of here!! He doesn’t belong in office!!

attributes.title: ❤️My story of our orange god ❤️
attributes.review: I downloaded this to support my president the big orange Cheeto and when I opened it my whole house shook and the Cheetos I was eating started chanting, “5 stars for our leader” “Go big orange god” and I was really upset because I really wanted some chips 😢😡 So then I quickly tried to delete it but then I saw him, the Cheeto leader staring down at me, then I died from horror and I am now writing this story in heaven! Pls don’t download 😡😡😡
